body_text: We should probably use Ant.Grid's push attribute instead of a righted class, but I tried setting it up and it came out real wonky, so maybe not.
body: We should probably use Ant.Grid's `push` attribute instead of a `righted` class, but I tried setting it up and it came out real wonky, so maybe not.
